rundown: 5-4 W @ Cleveland Guardians Erick Fedde: 4.0 innings, 4 earned runs, 6 hits, 0 HR, 5 strikeouts Batters: Jurickson Profar (2 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 2 RBI) Ozzie Albies (2 hits - 4 AB, 0 HR, 1 RBI) Nacho Alvarez Jr. (1 hit - 3 AB, 0 HR, 1 RBI) The Braves secured a narrow victory against the Guardians, showcasing a strong offensive performance. Key highlights include Jurickson Profar's impactful home run and two RBIs, which helped propel the team to victory. Ozzie Albies also contributed significantly with two hits, while Nacho Alvarez Jr. added an important RBI. Despite a shaky outing from Erick Fedde, the Braves' offense was able to outpace the Guardians, leading to the win.
